name: falcon-backend
description: Backend API for FALCON - Aviation Weather Briefing & Visualization system for pilots

scripts.health: curl -sf http://localhost:3001/health >/dev/null && echo 'Backend health: OK' || (echo 'Backend health: FAIL' && exit 1)
scripts.validate-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const required = ['GEMINI_API_KEY', 'PORT', 'NODE_ENV', 'CORS_ORIGINS']; const missing = required.filter(key => !process.env[key]); if (missing.length) { console.error('Missing required environment variables:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } console.log('Environment variables validated successfully');"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "(async()=>{try{await import('@google/generative-ai');console.log('Google Generative AI SDK loaded successfully');}catch(e){console.warn('Warning: Google Generative AI SDK could not be loaded:',e.message)}})();"
scripts.health:check: node -e "const ServiceHealthCheckers = require('../service-health-checkers.js'); const checkers = new ServiceHealthCheckers(); checkers.checkAllServices().then(results => console.log('Backend services:', JSON.stringify(results, null, 2)));"
scripts.health:gemini: node -e "const ServiceHealthCheckers = require('../service-health-checkers.js'); const checkers = new ServiceHealthCheckers(); checkers.checkGeminiHealth().then(result => console.log('Gemini service:', JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)));"
scripts.health:awc: node -e "const ServiceHealthCheckers = require('../service-health-checkers.js'); const checkers = new ServiceHealthCheckers(); checkers.checkAwcHealth().then(result => console.log('AWC service:', JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)));"
scripts.health:backend: node -e "const ServiceHealthCheckers = require('../service-health-checkers.js'); const checkers = new ServiceHealthCheckers(); checkers.checkBackendHealth().then(result => console.log('Backend service:', JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)));"
scripts.performance:check: node -e "const PerformanceMonitor = require('../performance-monitor.js'); const monitor = new PerformanceMonitor(); monitor.collectMetrics().then(metrics => console.log('Backend performance:', JSON.stringify(metrics.application, null, 2)));"
scripts.environment:check: node -e "const EnvironmentValidator = require('../environment-validator.js'); const validator = new EnvironmentValidator(); validator.validateEnvironmentVariables('backend').then(result => console.log('Backend environment:', JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)));"

author: FALCON Team
